about.title: About Me
about.text1: I am a senior full-stack engineer with a passion for creating interesting products. A creative, curious, and innovative teammate, excited to push boundaries, embrace challenges, and think outside the box.
about.text2: // Full-stack development is just one of my advantages.
about.text3: I have comprehensive experience with Java, Python, JavaScript, iOS, and with a background in AI, FinTech and Internet business, I am good at building products (0 - N) from scratch and leveraging technology to drive business value.
about.text4: In addition to focusing on technology, I bring a wealth of ideas to product development and operational growth.
about.text5: Rather than positioning myself as a Backend / Full-Stack / Engineer, I prefer to identify as a Creative Thinker and Problem Solver.
